content: IDP Insulation fastener Economical plastic insulation anchor for fastening hard insulating materials to concrete and masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick and easy impact installation Insulating material thickness: up to 150 mm Depth of embedment: 25 mm Applications Fastening hard, self-supporting, insulating materials such as expanded polystyrene ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Masonry (solid), Masonry (hollow), Concrete (tough) Working principle: Impact anchor Drill bit diameter: 5/16 in Technical Data | Base materials | Masonry (solid), Masonry (hollow), Concrete (tough) | Working principle | Impact anchor | Insulation material | Mineral wool, Soft board (e.g. EPS), Hard board (e.g. XPS, PUR, PIR) | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Type of fixing | Through-fastening | Material composition | Polyamide | Material, corrosion | Plastic ### ITEMS- 332105 - Insulation anchor IDP 0/2 - Package Size 250 pc Package Contents: - 1x IDP 0/2 Insulation mandrel - 332106 - Insulation anchor IDP 2/4 - Package Size 250 pc Package Contents: - 1x IDP 2/4 Insulation mandrel - 332107 - Insulation anchor IDP 4/6 - Package Size 250 pc Package Contents: - 1x IDP 4/6 Insulation mandrel - 332108 - Insulation anchor IDP 6/8 - Package Size 250 pc Package Contents: - 1x IDP 6/8 Insulation mandrel - 332109 - Insulation anchor IDP 8/10 - Package Size 250 pc Package Contents: - 1x IDP 8/10 Insulation mandrel - 332110 - Insulation anchor IDP 10/12 - Package Size 250 pc Package Contents: - 1x IDP 10/12 Insulation mandrel
